mapper.insert: INSERT INTO car (car_num, car_fuel, car_content, car_price, car_manual) VALUES (carnum_sequence.nextval, #{car_fuel}, #{car_content}, #{car_price}, #{car_manual})
INSERT INTO car_photo (car_photonum, car_num, car_picture) VALUES (carphotonum_sequence.nextval, #{car_num}, #{car_picture})
INSERT INTO car_type (car_num, car_class, car_maker) VALUES (#{car_num}, #{car_class}, #{car_maker})
